About Automic's Hudson Package ================================ Hudson is a continuous integration (CI) tool written in Java, which runs in a servlet container, such as Apache Tomcat or the GlassFish application server. It supports SCM tools including CVS,Subversion, Git, Perforce, Clearcase and RTC, and can execute Apache Ant and Apache Maven based projects, as well as arbitrary shell scripts and Windows batch commands. With this package we automate the triggering of build on Hudson
=Supported Eclipse Hudson versions= * Hudson CLI version 3.3.3
=Setup= * Oracle JDK 1.7 or higher must be installed on Agent OS and "java" must be executable on the same. * Agent should be able to access Eclipse Hudosn HTTP URL.
=Actions=
Following actions are supported for Hudson.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ECLIPSE_HUDSON.PUB.ACTION.TRIGGER_BUILD Action Description: Trigger build. This action is used to trigger the build on hudson.
